landing.features.monitoring.description: Real-time Web monitoring and weekly monitoring for radio and TV.

landing.features.reports.description: Download your web coverage in CSV, and your TV/Radio in Excel. Clips for TV and radio available upon request.

landing.pricing.webRadioTv.title: Web+Radio+TV
landing.pricing.webRadioTv.features: Weekly TV and Radio monitoring per region.

landing.testimonials.title: What Our Customers Say
landing.testimonials.1.quote: MediaMatch is the most affordable way to stay on top of industry trends. It's an indispensable tool for our team.
landing.testimonials.1.author: Isabelle, PR coordinator MO:PR
landing.testimonials.2.quote: The real-time alerts have helped us respond quickly to market changes. Highly recommended!
landing.testimonials.2.author: Yves Bellemard, Market Analyst at Mononews
landing.testimonials.3.quote: Media Match custom filters are super easy to use. The whole app is simple and the service they provide is second to none.
landing.testimonials.3.author: Emily Brown, PR Manager
